pkgmetadata.longdescription: ## Fake Headers**An ideal tool for generating random user agents**```User Agents:Elementaryos # elementary OSBlackberry # blackberryOpenbsd # openbsdWindows # windowsConsole # nintendo/ps/xboxAndroid # androidSumbian # sumbian OSSunos # Sun OSLinux # fedora/ubuntu/debian & otherIos # ios``````pythonfrom headers import uaua.elementaryos() #Generate elementary OS user agentua.blackberry() #Generate Blackberry user agentua.windows() #Generate Windows user agentua.console() #Generate Nintendo/PS/Xbox user agentua.openbsd() #Generate OpenBSD user agentua.sumbian() #Generate Sumbian user agentua.android() #Generate Android user agentua.sunos() #Generate sun OS user agentua.linux() #Generate Linux user agentua.ios() #Generate IOS user agent```
